headline: Caterpillar (CAT): Assessing Valuation as Analyst Upgrades Follow AI Data Center Power Push
summary: Caterpillar (CAT) is making headlines as investors home in on its expanding position in the AI infrastructure space. The company is capturing attention with new partnerships to deliver large-scale power solutions for data center growth. See our latest analysis for Caterpillar. Momentum around Caterpillar has picked up, with the stock rallying over 22% in the last month alone and 50% year-to-date, as investor excitement grows over its deepening involvement in AI infrastructure and smart power...
